title: Factors impacting employee's satisfaction and commitment in banking industry in Surabaya
abstract: This research is done to know whether or not motivational factors - consists of rewards, working conditions, managerial abilities, employee participation, company policies, recognition and feedback, as well as job interest and importance - simultaneously and individually have the satisfaction level and commitment level of banking industry employees i Multiple regressions were used as the analysis technique to reveal the relationship between them. The results show that Motivational Factors simultaneously have impact on both employee's satisfaction and commitment level, while job interest and importance was found to be the only factor that individually have impact on the satisfaction and the commitment level of banking industry employees in Surabaya.
contributors: Liem Pei Fun, S.E., M.Com. (Advisor 1); Adelina Proboyo (Examination Committee 1)
